thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India Budget: Export Of Agri Commodities To Be Liberalised

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India Budget: Export Of Agri Commodities To Be Liberalised
text:
MUMBAI, Feb 1 (Reuters) - Finance Minister Says:
: TO IMPLEMENT SPECIAL SCHEMES FOR GOVTS AROUND DELHI TO ADDRESS AIR POLLUTION
: TO SPEND 14.34 TRLN RUPEES ON CREATION OF RURAL INFRASTRUCTURE IN 2018/19
: EXPORT OF AGRI COMMODITIES TO BE LIBERALISED : TO INVEST 1 TRLN RUPEES IN DEVELOPMENT OF PREMIUM EDUCATION INFRASTRUCTURE OVER NEXT FOUR YEARS (Reporting by New Delhi Newsroom)
